Text Overflow

# Text Overflow

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                 | Support     |
| --------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
truncate
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
text-ellipsis
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
text-clip
```     | 🌐 Web only |
